duties_responsibilities.duty: Extensive experience in JDE World Homebuilder, Job Cost, and Procurement module functions and associated business processes.
Hands-on experience in World and E1 will be an added advantage.
Experience working in migration of JDE World to EnterpriseOne.
Experience in data preparation, conversion, and validation World to E1 migration.
Works effectively in a collaborative environment with project team peers, leadership, and vendors.
